Text:
Hey thanks, NLUPPER! I just want to tell you real quick... that I think you're awesome! You always seed the best files around. I got tons of love you for you!!

Now, if I may suggest something... Is it too much to ask that movies have both a PAL and a NTSC version? It would really be tremendously helpful for all us NTSC users out here.

Thank you for sharing regardless. You have my support!
